bounds.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the limits of what is possible or acceptable
bounds.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The humor in the movie sometimes goes beyond the bounds of good taste.
be/go beyond the bounds of credibility/reason/decency etc
It was not beyond the bounds of possibility that they could meet again.
be within/beyond the bounds of possibility
We are here to make sure that the police operate within the bounds of the law.
bounds.translation[0].definitions[1].def: the edges of a town, city etc
